title: Drawing, "Sketches from Angastura (?), Colombia: Bank of a River or Bay and a Group of Trees.", 1853
markings: Watermark:  The other parts of the letters K F
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, at bottom left: red / rock / yellow; at center right: Palm / Sanda Ynes; Mil pesos / Palm; and in bottom right corner: This is the name given by the Co...(?) / of the Barranquilla; and at top right: Angastura
description: Horizontal view with a landscape at top, a group of trees at the bottom left, and two palms at center right.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Sketches from Angastura (?), Colombia: Bank of a River or Bay and a Group of Trees.", 1853.
1853. Graphite on gray paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-68.
